<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>:</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.658em, 1011.85em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-56"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-57"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">:</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর পৃষ্ঠ থেকে উপরের দিকে অভিকর্ষজ ত্বরণের গ্রাফ-</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>পৃথিবীর পৃষ্ঠ হতে উপরের দিকের জন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.5em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-91"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-96"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm g\propto\frac{1}{R^2}</script></span> যা অধিবৃত্ত।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো মহাকর্ষীয় ক্ষেত্রে মহাকর্ষ প্রাবল্য, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="width: 11.365em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.316em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.977em, 1009.32em, 3.988em, -999.998em); top: -3.24em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-100"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-101"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-102"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-103"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.673em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.246em; left: 0.114em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">12</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-118"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-119"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-120"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">N</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-125"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-126"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.243em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.816em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm \vec{E}=\left(5\hat{i}+12\hat{j}\right)N/kg</script></span> হলে, 2 kg ভরের একটি বস্তুর উপর মহাকর্ষীয় বলের পরিমাণ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

padding-left: 0.289em;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-172"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">26</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>12</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>13</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>13</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>26</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm \left|\vec{E}\right|=\sqrt{5^2+{12}^2}=13\ N/kg\ ,\ F=E.m =\left(13\times2\right)N=26\ N </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন অঞ্চলের ক্ষেত্রে পৃথিবীর ঘূর্ণন গতি g&nbsp;এর মানের উপর সবচেয়ে বেশি প্রভাব ফেলে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>বিষুবীয় অঞ্চলের ক্ষেত্রে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03BB;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.97em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">λ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>λ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\lambda=0</script></span> এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="width: 4.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-188"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-193"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-194"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>0</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm cos0°=1</script></span> যা সর্বাধিক। তাই বিষুবীয় অঞ্চলে বেশি প্রভাব পড়বে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>a বাহুবিশিষ্ট সুষম ষড়ভূজের 6&nbsp;মাথায় 6&nbsp;টি m&nbsp;ভর রাখা হল। ষড়ভুজের কেন্দ্রে বিভব কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2211;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="width: 11.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.26em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-227"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-family: MathJax_Size1; vertical-align: 0em;">∑</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-234"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.15em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.572em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-235"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.27em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-241"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.48em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-242"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.6em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∑</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>×</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm \sum V=6\times-\frac{Gm}{a}=-\frac{6Gm}{a} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর কেন্দ্র হতে R&nbsp;দূরত্বে ঘূর্ণনরত কোনো উপগ্রহের মুক্তিবেগ কত? [R পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ]</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="width: 3.736em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.053em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1002.83em, 2.735em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-248"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-249"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.78em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1001.73em, 4.374em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-250"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.6em, 1001.78em, 3.918em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 1.004em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.778em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.005em; left: -0.089em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

left: 0.248em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm=\frac{1}{2}\frac{GMm}{R}\therefore V_e=\sqrt{\frac{GM}{R}}=\sqrt{gR}\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 7 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>m ভরের একটি বস্তুকে কোনো কক্ষপথের 2R&nbsp;থেকে 3R&nbsp;অবস্থায় নিতে প্রয়োজনীয় শক্তি-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="width: 2.689em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="width: 5.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1004.1em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-347"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-351"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-352"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm E=-\frac{GMm}{r} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="width: 14.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1011.64em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-358"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.34em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-363"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-368"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.46em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-374"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.34em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-375"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-380"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.46em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-386"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∆</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm ∆E=\frac{-GMm}{3R}-\left(\frac{-GMm}{2R}\right)=\frac{GMm}{6R}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 171px;"></p>

<p>B একটি গ্রহ যা একটি মহাজাগতিক কাল্পনিক দড়ির সাহায্যে ঝুলে আছে এবং C&nbsp;একটি বিন্দুভর। B&nbsp;গ্রহের জন্য C&nbsp;বিন্দুতে মহাকর্ষীয় বিভব কত?</p>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি কৃত্রিম উপগ্রহ পৃথিবীর চারপাশে বৃত্তাকার কক্ষপথে ঘুরছে যার গতিশক্তি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="width: 1.38em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1001.12em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-416"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-417"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.12em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.673em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.093em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm E_o</script></span>। এর বিভব শক্তি কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="width: 3.235em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.643em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.64em, 2.507em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-427"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-430"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.219em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.114em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm1.5\ E_o </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="width: 2.917em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="width: 1.368em;                                             </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>গতিশক্তি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="width: 5.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.264em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1004.26em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-446"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-452"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.3em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-456"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.5em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm E_o=\frac{GMm}{2(R+h)}</script></span>,&nbsp;বিভবশক্তি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="width: 5.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1004.14em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-464"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-468"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-469"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-473"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm V=-\frac{GMm}{R+h}</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-477" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1004.47em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-478"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">V</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-482" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-484"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm \therefore V=-2E_o</script></span>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 10 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবী ও সূর্যের মধ্যকার দূরত্ব R। তাদের মধ্যকার দূরত্ব যদি দ্বিগুণ করা হয়, তাহলে সূর্যের চারপাশে পৃথিবীর পরিভ্রমণ কাল হবে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1 বছর</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="width: 1.642em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.186em, 1001.32em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-488"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-489"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-490"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.6em, 1000.5em, 3.918em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.053em, 1000.87em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.051em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </label>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-541"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-542"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>8</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm\left(\frac{T_2}{T_1}\right)^2=\left(\frac{R_2}{R_1}\right)^3\Rightarrow T_2=\sqrt8=2\sqrt2</script></span>&nbsp;বছর</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 11 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো গ্রহের কক্ষপথের ব্যাস পৃথিবীর 25&nbsp;গুণ। ঐ গ্রহের আবর্তনকাল-</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
