                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>125</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="width: 17.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1014.39em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-545"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-546"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-548" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-550" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-552" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-553" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1001.68em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-559"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 1.764em;"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-563"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-567" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">125</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Y</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>∝</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>125</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm T^2\propto a^3\therefore T_2=\left(25\right)^\frac{3}{2}\times T_1=125\ Years</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পৃথিবীর ব্যাসার্ধ অপরিবর্তিত থেকে ভর 75% হ্রাস পেলে মুক্তিবেগ কত হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>15.84</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-614" style="width: 6.423em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="width: 10.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.658em, 1008.94em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-627"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-628"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.953em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.994em, 1001.93em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-633"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-634"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.52em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.777em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-635"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-636" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-637" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.244em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.68em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.682em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.93em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.916em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 1.232em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.33em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.781em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-641" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-643" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-645" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.9em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-646"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.03em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.33em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.096em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></msub><mo>∝</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm v_e=\sqrt{\frac{2GM}{R}}\Rightarrow v_e\propto\sqrt M</script></span></p>

<p>প্রাথমিক অবস্থায়,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="width: 4.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.65em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-649"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-650"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-652"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-653"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-654"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-size: 50%; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.096em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p>ভর হ্রাস পাওয়ার পর,&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.75</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="width: 8.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1007.22em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-662"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-665"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-666"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-667"><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.158em, 1005.12em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-672"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1005.21em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.207em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0.75</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>0.25</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="width: 17.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1014.43em, 2.912em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-680"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.95em, 4.428em, -999.998em); top: -4.67em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-683"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-712"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-713"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-714"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 1.109em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-724"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-725"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-726"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.402em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.75</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mfrac></msqrt><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>0.25</mn></msqrt><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm \therefore\frac{v_{e_2}}{v_{e_1}}=\sqrt{\frac{(1-0.75)M}{M}}\Rightarrow v_{e_2}=\sqrt{0.25}\times v_{e_1} </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>11.2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5.6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="width: 11.232em; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি কৃত্রিম উপগ্রহের গতিশক্তি নির্দেশ করে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="width: 7.516em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.549em, 1006.15em, 3.008em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-750"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-751"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.192em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.735em, 1003.33em, 4.784em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-752"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-754"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="width: 8.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1007.17em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-812"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-820"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-825"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.3em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.186em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-829"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.5em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.502em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm k=\frac{1}{2}\ mv^2=\frac{GMm}{2(R+h)} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 14 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নেপচুনের ব্যাস পৃথিবীর 4 গুণ ও ভর পৃথিবীর 16&nbsp;গুণ। নেপচুনের অভিকর্ষজ ত্বরণ কত? [পৃথিবীতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="width: 6.485em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.292em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1005.18em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-837"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x221D;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-891" style="width: 8.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1006.6em, 2.625em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-892"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.19em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-896"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-899"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∝</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-907"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>∝</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\rm g=\frac{GM}{R^2}\Rightarrow g\propto\frac{M}{R^2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="width: 25.084em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-961"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-963"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-964"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\rm \therefore g_N=g_E\times\left(\frac{R_E}{R_N}\right)^2\times\left(\frac{M_N}{M_E}\right)=10\times\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)^2\times16=10\ ms^{-2}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 15 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি লোক লিফটের মাধ্যমে উপরে উঠলে ও নিচে নামলে 275&nbsp;N&nbsp;ওজনের তারতম্য অনুভব করেন। লিফটের ত্বরণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="width: 4.883em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.988em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1003.99em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-968"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-973"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-975"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-976"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm \ 2.5\ ms^{-2}</script></span> হলে, লোকটির ভর কত?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="width: 7.118em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.814em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1005.7em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-980"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-982" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-987"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-989"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-990"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.411em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm[g=10\ ms^{-2}]</script></span></p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>275</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="width: 16.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1013.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-995"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1001"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">m</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1011"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">275</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>275</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm \Rightarrow m\ \left(g+a\right)-m\ \left(g-a\right)=275=2ma </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>275</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>55</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="width: 8.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.34em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1023"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">275</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1029"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1031" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1032" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2.5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">55</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>275</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2.5</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>55</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm \therefore m=\frac{275}{2\times2.5}=55\ kg</script></span>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="width: 1.778em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.459em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.46em, 2.507em, -999.998em);                                         <div class="serial">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="width: 3.616em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.95em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1067"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1068"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.71em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1072"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1075" style="width: 22.912em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1018.73em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1076"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>×</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm (+1)\times2+x+(-2)\times3=0 \Rightarrow\ x-4=0\Rightarrow x=+4 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 18 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="width: 18.556em;
