width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.263em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm SnCl_2+2FeCl_3=SnCl_4+2FeCl_2;</script></span>&nbsp;বিক্রিয়াটির ক্ষেত্রে কোনটি সত্য?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1170" style="width: 8.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.97em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1171"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1173"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1175"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1176"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1178" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">→</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1181"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1183"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1184"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1186" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1189"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm Sn^{2+}\rightarrow Sn^{4+}+2e^-</script></span>&nbsp;বিজারক (জারিত হয়েছে)।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>অম্লীয় মাধ্যমে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1192" style="width: 4.845em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.951em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.95em, 2.498em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1193"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1194"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.75em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1198"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1201"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1203" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.225em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>7</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\rm K_2Cr_2O_7</script></span> কয়টি ইলেকট্রন গ্রহণ করে?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="width: 5.33em; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>25</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm 25\ mL \ 1M</script></span> দ্বিক্ষারকীয় তীব্র অম্ল দ্রবণের সাথে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="width: 5.665em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.622em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.59em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1269"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm 50\ mL\ 1\ M</script></span> কস্টিক সোডা দ্রবণ যোগ করলে মিশ্র দ্রবণের সম্ভাব্য pH&nbsp;কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi></mrow></msub><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="width: 6.723em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.903em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow></msub><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm \therefore n_{acid}=\ n_{base};</script></span>&nbsp;নিরপেক্ষ মিশ্রণ হবে।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1373"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;সম্ভাব্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.58em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1376"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm pH=7</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 22 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="width: 9.167em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.491em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1007.49em, 2.573em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>12.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1398" style="width: 14.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1012.22em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1399"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1.25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1402" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1403"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1404"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1406"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1407"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1408" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1409" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1428"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm \therefore</script></span>&nbsp;মাত্রা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="width: 13.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1010.86em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1431"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.17em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1434"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1436" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.68em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1438"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.25</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1446"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1447"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">50</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>50</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm =\frac{12.5mg}{0.25L}=50\ mg/L=50\ ppm</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>98</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>500</mn></mrow><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1484" style="width: 18.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.699em, 1015.12em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1485"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.67em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1489"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.72em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.859em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1493"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1495" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.83em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1500" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.609em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1003.45em, 4.428em, -999.998em); top: -4.711em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1501"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1502"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.371em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.342em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.21em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1505" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1506" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">98</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1507" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1508" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">500</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.39em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.695em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.61em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.609em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1510" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">W</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1512" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1513" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9.8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>×</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>×</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>98</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>500</mn></mrow><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9.8</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm S=\frac{W\times1000}{M\times V}\Rightarrow W=\frac{\frac{1}{5}\times98\times500}{1000}\therefore W=9.8\ g </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>ক্রিসল রেডের বর্ণ পরিবর্তনের pH&nbsp;পরিসর-</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="width: 1.455em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1571" style="width: 1.455em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="width: 4.212em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1577"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1582" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;                                         </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">V</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.898em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.853em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-112">\rm V_1S_1+V_2S_2=VS\Rightarrow V_1+3V_2=2(V_1+V_2) \\ \Rightarrow V_1+3V_2=2V_1+2V_2\ \therefore V_1=V_2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 29 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন যৌগে কার্বনের জারণ সংখ্যা ও যোজনী সমান?</p>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>6</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.325em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.33em, 2.507em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 30 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পানিতে পচনশীল ও অপচনশীল জৈব দূষককে সম্পূর্ণ জারিত করতে প্রয়োজনীয় <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-119-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="width: 1.455em;                             <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Higher Mathematics (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 31 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="width: 7.416em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>14</mn><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1795" style="width: 16.068em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1796"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1798" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.855em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1003.69em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1820" style="font-size: 50%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.855em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1822" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.018em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1003.89em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.965em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1823"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1824" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1825" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1827" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1828" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1829" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1830" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1831" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1833" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.02em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.018em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1839" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1840" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">14</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1842" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>14</mn><mn>17</mn></mfrac><mi>i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\Rightarrow\frac{\left(2+3i\right)(4+i)}{4^2-i^2}=\frac{2i+8+12i-3}{17}=\frac{5}{17}+\frac{14}{17}i </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>70</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1883" style="width: 3.008em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>13</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1894" style="width: 15.822em; <p>মডুলাস&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>13</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>170</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1921" style="width: 10.945em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 33 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1942" style="width: 10.769em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.832em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1008.79em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1943"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1944"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.859em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1946" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1947" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1948" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">i</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1953" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1954" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1955"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.859em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.41em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.836em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1958" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\rm z_1=-1+i\ ,\ z_2=5i </script></span>&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="width: 1.194em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1000.82em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1997"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1998"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1999"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2001" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2002"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 34 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-144-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>21</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="width: 4.287em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.504em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1003.47em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2090"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2092" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">20</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>21</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-144">\rm 21-20i</script></span>&nbsp;এর বর্গমূল কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>21</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>20</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2.5.2</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2119" style="width: 17.748em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 35 </span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2242" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2244"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2247" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">\sqrt{2i}=\sqrt{1+2i+i^2\ }=\sqrt{\left(1+i\right)^2}=\pm\left(1+i\right) </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
