                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>76</mn><mo>;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2289" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.56em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2290"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">76</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>76</mn><mo>;</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">76;4 </script></span> দ্বারা বিভাজ্য।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>76</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2294" style="width: 13.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.781em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1010.74em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2295"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2296" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2297" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2299" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2300" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2303" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2304" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2305" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">⋯</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2310" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.15em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2311" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2312"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2313"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">76</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>76</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-162">\therefore i+i^2+i^3+\cdots\cdots+i^{76}=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-163-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>77</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>77</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2317" style="width: 20.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1016.8em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2318"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2319" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2324" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>⋯</mo><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>77</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>77</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-163">\therefore1+i+i^2+i^3+\cdots\cdots+i^{77}=1+i^{77}=1+i</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2393" style="width: 1.414em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.14em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2394"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2396" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>ω</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">2\omega </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8.</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2397" style="width: 28.732em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2398"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2399"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2411" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2445" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2446" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>8.</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">\rm \left(-2\omega^2\right)^3-\left(-2\omega\right)^3=-8\omega^6+8\omega^3 
=-8.\left(\omega^3\right)^2+8\omega^3=-8+8=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-174-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mi>i</mi></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mi>i</mi></mfrac></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>i</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2520" style="width: 19.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.535em, 1015.74em, 2.912em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo accent=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo accent=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x00AF;</mo></mover><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="width: 25.002em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>23</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2727" style="width: 11.232em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2739" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2741"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2747" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">23</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>23</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-179">\rm =2\left(9-4\right)+\left(9+4\right)=23</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 40 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2775" style="width: 14.182em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2808" style="width: 17.584em; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2830"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2832"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2837" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2840" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1005.62em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.998em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 4.92em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.453em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.027em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.559em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 2.133em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 2.666em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 3.24em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 3.814em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.346em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.137em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-183">\rm \Rightarrow\sqrt{\left(x+1\right)^2+y^2}+\sqrt{\left(x-1\right)^2+y^2}=4</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-184-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="width: 1.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1000.78em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2845"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-184">\Rightarrow</script></span>&nbsp;এটি একটি বক্ররেখা যার প্রতিটি বিন্দুর জন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2847" style="width: 3.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.38em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2848"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2854" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">(-1,0)</script></span> এবং (1, 0) বিন্দু হতে দূরত্বের যোগফল 4&nbsp;একক।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2855" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2856"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2857" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">\therefore</script></span> এটি একটি উপবৃত্ত, যার বৃহদাক্ষ 4&nbsp;একক।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-191-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="width: 3.691em; top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2899"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2900"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2902"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2944" style="width: 9.674em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-195-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2966" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2967"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2968" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-195">\therefore</script></span> কেন্দ্র (7, 0) ও ব্যাসার্ধ 10&nbsp;একক</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-197-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2978" style="width: 0.458em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.367em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1000.32em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2979"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2980" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">i </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-199-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2985" style="width: 1.414em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1001.1em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2986"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2988" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mi>i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-199">-i </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>22466</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>22464</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2989" style="width: 8.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.93em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2990"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2992" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2994"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2995"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2996" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22466</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2998" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3000"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3001"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3002" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22464</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3003" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3004" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3006" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>22466</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>22464</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-200">\rm \Rightarrow i^{22466}=i^{22464+2}\ ;\  </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>22464</mn><mo>;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3008" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.79em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3009"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">22464</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>22464</mn><mo>;</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-201">22464;4</script></span>&nbsp;দ্বারা বিভাজ্য।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-202-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>22466</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3013" style="width: 8.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1006.97em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3014"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3015" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3016" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.133em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3018"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3019"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3020" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">22466</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1.</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3023"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3025" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-3029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>22466</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1.</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-202">\rm\therefore i^{22466}=1.i^2=-1\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <div class="serial">

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-205-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3047" style="width: 2.234em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.824em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1001.82em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3048"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3050"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.05em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.59em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3051" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.64em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3052" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.225em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-205">-\omega^2 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-206-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3053" style="width: 1.277em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.05em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1001.05em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3054"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3055"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.05em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.59em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3056" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.64em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3057" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-206">\omega^2 </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-207-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3058" style="width: 0.64em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1000.41em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3059"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-207">1</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3061" style="width: 19.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1016.03em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3062"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3064" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.99em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3065"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3067"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3070" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">ω</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3071" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.076em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3072" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3073" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3074" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1002.58em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3075"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3076" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3077"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3079"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3080" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3081" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3082" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 2.748em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3083" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3086"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3087" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3088" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3091"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.379em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.8em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3092"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3093" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3094"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3095" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">ω</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.617em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3096" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3097" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 1.969em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3098" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3099" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.802em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>ω</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-208">\Rightarrow\left(1+\omega\right)^3=\left(-\omega^2\right)^3=-\omega^6=-\left(\omega^3\right)^2=-1 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 44 </span>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.867em, 1000.87em, 1.186em, -999.998em); top: -1.273em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-210">\rm 2\cos{\frac{5\pi}{6}}+\sin{\frac{5\pi}{6}}i </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মডুলাস&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-214-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3213" style="width: 9.797em; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-217">\rm =2\left(\cos{\frac{5\pi}{6}}+\sin{\frac{5\pi}{6}}i\right)</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-3408" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.043em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.53em, 3.773em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3410" style=""><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.207em;"><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">¯</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3412" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3413" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3416" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3417" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">11</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>11</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></mrow><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mo>∴</mo><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mo accent="false">¯</mo></mover><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-224">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{\left(5+3i\right)\left(2+i\right)}{\left(2+i\right)\left(2-i\right)}=\frac{7+11i}{5}=\frac{7}{5}+\frac{11}{5}i=z 
\therefore\overline{z}=\frac{7}{5}-\frac{11}{5}i 
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Biology (15)</h2>

                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোন ব্যাকটেরিয়া পতঙ্গনাশক হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হয়?</p>
