                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><i>Bacillus thuringiensis </i></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><i>Azotobacter </i></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><i>Streptococcus lactis </i></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><i>Pseudomonas </i></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: <i>Azotobacter, Pseudomonas</i> ব্যাকটেরিয়া নাইট্রোজেন সংবন্ধনে এবং <i>Streptococcus lactis</i> দুগ্ধজাত শিল্পে ব্যবহৃত হয়।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Bangla (15)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                            </div>

                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রাজবন্দীর জবানবন্দী</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: দুর্দিনের যাত্রী, রুদ্রমঙ্গল ও রাজবন্দীর জবানবন্দী কাজী নজরুল ইসলামের উল্লেখযোগ্য প্রবন্ধগ্রন্থ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 62 </span>
                                        </div>

                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 63 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>“সেপথ ছাড়া অন্য কোন পথই আমার বিপথ নয়” ‘আমার পথ’ প্রবন্ধে লেখক এখানে ‘সে পথ’ বলতে কি বুঝিয়েছেন?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>

</label>

                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ধর্মের পথ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: লেখক সত্যের পূজারি, ন্যায় ও সুন্দরের অনুরাগী। এখানে সে পথ বলতে অসত্য, অন্যায়, বিপথকে বুঝানো হয়েছে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

</label>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 68 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>মাছুয়া &gt; মেছো- কোন নিয়ম?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অভিশ্রুতি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অপশ্রুতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>অন্তর্হতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সম্প্রকর্ষ</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">বিপর্যস্ত স্বরধ্বনি পূর্ববর্তী স্বরধ্বনির সাথে মিলে গেলে এবং তদনুসারে পরবর্তী স্বরধ্বনির পরিবর্তন ঘটলে তাকে বলে অভিশ্রুতি । যেমন- করিয়া থেকে অপিনিহিতির ফলে ‘কইরিয়া’ কিংবা বিপর্যয়ের ফলে ‘কইরা’ থেকে অভিশ্রুতিজাত ‘করে’। এরূপ শুনিয়া &gt; শুনে, বলিয়া &gt; বলে, হাটুয়া &gt; হাউটা &gt; হেটো, মাছুয়া &gt; মেছো ইত্যাদি।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 69 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনটি প্রগত স্বরসঙ্গতি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গিলা &gt; গেলা</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মুড়া &gt; মুড়ো</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>শিকা &gt; শিকে</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>দেশি &gt; দিশি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আদিস্বর অনুযায়ী অন্ত্যস্বর পরিবর্তিত হলে প্রগত স্বরসঙ্গতি হয়। যেমন- মুলা &gt; মুলো, শিকা &gt;শিকে, তুলা &gt; তুলো।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 70 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনগুলো আদি স্বরাগম?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>স্নেহ &gt; সিনেহ, দর্শন &gt; দরিশন</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>রত্ন &gt; রতন, ধর্ম &gt; ধরম</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>স্ত্রী &gt; ইস্ত্রী, স্কুল &gt; ইস্কুল</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্রাম &gt; গোরাম, প্রেক &gt; পেরেক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">উচ্চারণের সুবিধার জন্য বা অন্য কোনো কারণে শব্দের আদিতে স্বরধ্বনি এলে তাকে বলে আদি স্বরাগম। যেমন- স্কুল &gt; ইস্কুল, স্টেশন &gt; ইস্টিশন। এরূপ-আস্তাবল, আস্পর্ধা।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                    </div>

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>মধ্যগত স্বরসঙ্গতি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পরাগত স্বরসঙ্গতি</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অন্ত্যস্বরের কারণে আদ্যস্বর পরিবর্তিত হলে পরাগত স্বরসঙ্গতি হয়। যেমন- আখো &gt; আখুয়া &gt; এখো, দেশি &gt; দিশি।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 74 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘এলাচি’ কোন ভাষার শব্দ?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>আরবি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হিন্দি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>চীনা</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ফরাসি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">‘এলাচি’ চীনা ভাষার শব্দ। এরূপ - চা, চিনি। আরবি শব্দ - আল্লাহ, হালাল, আদালত, কানুন, কলম। হিন্দি শব্দ- ঝাণ্ডা, কাহিনি, ভাবি, দাদি। ফরাসি শব্দ - কুপন, ডিপো, রেস্তোরাঁ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 75 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>‘আনারস’ শব্দটি কোন ভাষা থেকে আগত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>হিন্দি</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>পর্তুগিজ</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>উর্দু</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>গ্রিক</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p style="text-align: justify;">‘আনারস’ শব্দটি পর্তুগিজ ভাষা থেকে আগত। এরূপ - আলপিন, আলমারি, গির্জা, গুদাম, চাবি, পাউরুটি, পাদ্রি, বালতি ইত্যাদি পর্তুগিজ শব্দ।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>English (15)</h2>
                            </div>

                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                            <span>Question 76 </span>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Overwrite, Overwrote, Overwritten.</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

    <div class="TakeExamHeader">
        
        
        
        <h2 style="font-size: 25px;">Written Master Set: 1 (Question &amp; Solution)</h2>
    </div>
            <div class="TakeExamBody">
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Physics (4)</h2>
                            </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 1</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>পৃথিবী পৃষ্ঠ হতে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5.76</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 6.746em;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>এখানে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="width: 15.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.42em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-58"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \frac{GM_Em}{\left(R+h\right)^2}=n\times\frac{GM_Em}{R^2}\Rightarrow\frac{1}{\left(R+h\right)^2}=\frac{n}{R^2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6.4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5.76</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="width: 15.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.494em, 1012.99em, 2.748em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.875em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-105" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.875em; left: 7.379em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6.4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>6</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5.76</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \Rightarrow\left(\frac{R}{R+h}\right)^2=n=\left(\frac{6.4\times{10}^6}{6.4\times{10}^6+5.76\times{10}^7}\right)^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="width: 10.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.65em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1008.65em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-109"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-113" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.85em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-114"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-115" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-116"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-117" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-118" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-119" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.588em; left: 1.969em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-120" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-121" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-124" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-125" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-126" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm \Rightarrow n=\left(\frac{1}{10}\right)^2\Rightarrow n=\frac{1}{100}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-128"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;ঐ উচ্চতায় g&nbsp;এর মান পৃথিবী পৃষ্ঠের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-130" style="width: 9.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1007.46em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-131"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-132" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-133" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-135"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-136"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-137" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-138" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-139" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">100</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-141" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">%</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm \ \left(\frac{1}{100}\times100\right)\%=1\%</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="width: 8.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1006.8em, 2.83em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-147"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-148"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.17em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-149"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-151"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1002.34em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.441em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.145em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-155"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1001.93em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-156"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-158"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-160" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-161" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-162" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 2.01em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-163" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; top: -3.891em; left: 0.658em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">E</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-174"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-175" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">E</mi></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm \frac{GM_Em}{\left(R+h\right)^2}=n\times\frac{GM_Em}{R^2}</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.75em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-178"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.19em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>100</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm n=\frac{1}{100}</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0025;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.79em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-185"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">%</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm g\ =1\%</script></span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 2</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 102px;"></p>

			<p>ABDC&nbsp;একটি বর্গ যার কেন্দ্র O&nbsp;বিন্দু। A, B, C, D বিন্দুতে যথাক্রমে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="width: 9.652em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.901em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1007.9em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-192"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm 7kg,\ 2kg, 3kg,\ 5kg</script></span> ভরের 4&nbsp;টি বস্তু রাখা আছে। O&nbsp;বিন্দুতে মহাকর্ষীয় বিভব কত? [মহাকর্ষীয় ধ্রুবক = G]&nbsp;</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="width: 0.658em; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;O&nbsp;বিন্দুতে মহাকর্ষীয় বিভব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>D</mi></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="width: 14.059em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>17</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-287" style="width: 17.748em; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>D</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="width: 13.895em;
