<p>O&nbsp;বিন্দুতে মহাকর্ষীয় বিভব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>17</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>J</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="width: 7.215em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-351"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-353" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-354"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-357"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">J</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-365"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.477em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-367"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-368"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>17</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">J</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm = \frac{-17\sqrt2}{3}G\ Jkg^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>[বি.দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 3</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>দুটি সমান ভরের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="width: 5.74em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.696em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1004.59em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-372"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-373"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-375"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm\left(m=1\ kg\right)</script></span> বস্তু একটি R ব্যাসার্ধ বিশিষ্ট বৃত্তাকার পথে, তাদের মধ্যকার মহাকর্ষ বলের প্রভাবে ঘুরছে। প্রত্যেকটি বস্তুর কৌণিক বেগ কত?</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 66px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="width: 17.625em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.27em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.52em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.834em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.518em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.371em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -3.973em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-444"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.994em, 1001.19em, 4.674em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-445"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-446"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-448"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.95em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.19em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.834em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.535em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.207em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -3.973em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.897em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>ω</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>ω</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm \Rightarrow\frac{Gm}{4R^3}=\omega^2\Rightarrow\omega=\frac{1}{2}\times\sqrt{\frac{Gm}{R^3}}=\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{\frac{G}{R^3}}</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi>&amp;#x03C9;</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="width: 6.109em; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>

নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি:দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>পৃথিবীর কেন্দ্র হতে 10000 km দূরে ঘূর্ণনরত কোন উপগ্রহের কেন্দ্রমুখী ত্বরণ কত?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6400</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="width: 14.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.148em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1012.04em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-488"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

                                        </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-568"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-569"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>6400</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>10000000</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>6.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm v=\sqrt{\frac{GM}{R+h}}=\sqrt{\frac{gR^2}{R+h}}=R\sqrt{\frac{g}{R+h}}=6400\times{10}^3\times\sqrt{\frac{10}{10000000}}=6.4\ kms^{-1}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>6.4</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>10000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4.096</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="width: 13.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.863em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.617em, 1010.86em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-573"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-577"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.44em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.736em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.6em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.76em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.89em, 1.191em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="width: 6.15em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.04em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-604"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-605" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6.4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-613"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-614"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-615" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6.4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm v=6.4\ kms^{-1}</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.096</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.37em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-618"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি:দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</strong></p>

<p><strong>বিকল্প সমাধান:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>G</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>6400000</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10000000</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4.096</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="width: 22.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.453em, 1018.45em, 2.83em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; margin-left: -0.408em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-642"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-643" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">G</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-674"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.95em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-675"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -4.342em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1003.69em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -3.441em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.842em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-680"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1003.32em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-681"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10000000</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.342em; left: 3.363em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 4.715em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.096</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-690"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-692"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-693"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">G</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>6400000</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>10000000</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4.096</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm a=\frac{v^2}{r}=\frac{\frac{GM}{R+h}}{R+h}=\frac{gR^2}{\left(R+h\right)^2}=\frac{10\times\left(6400000\right)^2}{\left(10000000\right)^2}=4.096\ ms^{-2}</script></span></strong></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.096</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="width: 6.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.371em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1005.37em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-697"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.096</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-703"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-705"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-706"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4.096</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm a=4.096\ ms^{-2}</script></span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ২.৫ নম্বর।<br>
<strong>[বি:দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                            <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                                <h2>Chemistry (4)</h2>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
			<p>(a) পানির COD&nbsp;কী? (০১)</p>

			<p>(b) 20 mL সেমিমোলার <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="width: 4.249em; (১.৫)</p>
			</td>
			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">(a) প্রতি লিটার সারফেস ওয়াটারের নমুনায় থাকা দূষক পচনশীল জৈব বস্তু ও অপচনশীল জৈব যৌগকে সম্পূর্ণ জারিত করে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="width: 7.01em; <p style="text-align: justify;">টাইট্রেশনের মূলনীতি অনুসারে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>V</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-811" style="width: 15.207em; <p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="width: 22.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1018.65em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-859"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-873"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-874"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-876" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-878"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-884"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-885"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-889"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>20</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>×</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm \Rightarrow10\times20\times0.5=2\times100\times S_{FeSO_4}\therefore S_{FeSO_4}=0.5M</script></span></p>

<p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
(a) সংজ্ঞা লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="width: 13.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.95em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-896"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-900" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-901" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-902" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-906"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-908" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-915" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-916" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">K</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-918" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-919"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>≡</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm 10\ mol\ FeSO_4\equiv2\ mol\ KMnO_4</script></span> বুঝতে পারার জন্য অথবা সমতাকৃত বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
এককসহ ঘনমাত্রা নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
<strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>জারণ অর্ধ-বিক্রিয়া:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="width: 10.33em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-949"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-950"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p>বিজারণ অর্ধ-বিক্রিয়া:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="width: 20.576em; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo></msubsup><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>−</mo></msup><mo stretchy="false">→</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>…</mo><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm MnO_4^-+8H^++5e^-\rightarrow Mn^{2+}+4H_2O\ldots\ldots(ii)</script></span></p>

<p>জারণ অর্ধ-বিক্রিয়া ও বিজারণ অর্ধ-বিক্রিয়ায় ইলেকট্রন সংখ্যা সমান করার জন্য (i) নং সমীকরণকে 5&nbsp;দিয়ে এবং (ii) নং সমীকরণকে 2&nbsp;দিয়ে গুণ করে যোগ করে পাই,</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ&nbsp;</strong><br>
জারণ অর্ধ-বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
বিজারণ অর্ধ-বিক্রিয়া লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
সমতাযুক্ত আয়নিক সমীকরণ নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
সমতাযুক্ত আণবিক সমীকরণ নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

<p>বা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="width: 22.953em;
