padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.76em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1347"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1348" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0.5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.03em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.531em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">100</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.93em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1356"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1357"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1359"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1360"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>0.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.5</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>100</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm 0.5\ mL\ 1\ M\ H_2SO_4\therefore\ \left[H_2SO_4\right]=\frac{0.5\times1}{100}=5\times{10}^{-3}\ M</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="width: 24.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1020.17em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1366"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1371"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1381"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1382"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1384"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1385"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.01</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">M</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">log</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1399"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1400" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1401"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1402"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1404"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1407" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1408" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>∴</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>log</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm \therefore\ \left[H^+\right]=2\times5\times{10}^{-3}=0.01\ M\therefore\ pH=-\log{\left[H^+\right]}=2</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p>অতিরিক্ত <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1410" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.42em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1411"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1412"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1416"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm H_2SO_4</script></span> এর পরিমাণ নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.48em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1420"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1421"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">[</span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1423"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1426" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>]</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\rm\left[H^+\right]</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p>pH নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">
                                                        <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8</span>
                                            
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
	<tbody>
		<tr>

width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.687em; left: 2.722em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style=""><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">]</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">S</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1446"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.194em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.71em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.836em; left: 0.784em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.407em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>4</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\rm\left[Cu\left(NH_3\right)_4\right]SO_4</script></span> যৌগে কেন্দ্রীয় মৌলের জারণ সংখ্যা কত? (১.৫)<br>
			(b) জারক-বিজারক চিহ্নিত কর:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="width: 16.433em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.452em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1013.45em, 2.535em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; 			<td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                        <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                                            <p>(a) কেন্দ্রীয় মৌল Cu&nbsp;এর জারণ মান x&nbsp;হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1483" style="width: 7.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.86em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1484"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\rm x+4\times0=\ +2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="width: 6.682em; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \therefore x=+2\therefore Cu</script></span>&nbsp;এর জারণ মান +2</p>

<p>(b)&nbsp;জারক:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>K</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>M</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="width: 6.682em; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1532"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm KI,\ H_2C_2O_4</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong>&nbsp;<br>
(a) কেন্দ্রীয় মৌল Cu; চিহ্নিত করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
Cu এর জারণ মান +2; নির্ণয় করার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
(b) প্রত্যেকটি যৌগ জারক না বিজারক চিহ্নিত করার জন্য (০.২৫<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1536"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>×</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\times</script></span>&nbsp;৪) =&nbsp;০১ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1599" style="width: 17.01em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm \Rightarrow5x-2xi+5-2i+5yi+2y=7+3i</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1625" style="width: 18.977em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1626"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1628" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1630"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1632" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">i</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1641" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1642" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1643"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1644" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1645" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p>তাহলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="width: 9.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.666em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.58em, 2.338em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mo>&amp;#x22EF;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1674" style="width: 11.764em; <p>(i) ও (ii) সমাধান করে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.39em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1695"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm x=0,\ y=1</script></span>&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1.</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="width: 7.174em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1705"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">z</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1.</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\rm \therefore z=0+1.i=i</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="width: 17.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1014.43em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1716"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1717"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1719"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1746" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm \left(5x+2y+5\right)+i\left(-2x-2+5y\right)=7+3i</script></span></strong>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.২৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1747" style="width: 2.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.68em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1748"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1749" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">i</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.903em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm z=i</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.২৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>144</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>600</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>625</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1916" style="width: 20.576em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>44</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>100</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>275</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1946" style="width: 16.805em; <p>এখানে, উৎকেন্দ্রিকতা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="width: 9.715em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.953em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.371em, 1007.87em, 3.035em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1979"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.543em, 1002.91em, 5.002em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1983"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1985" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\rm e=\sqrt{1+\frac{\frac{11}{4}}{\frac{25}{4}}}=\frac{6}{5}>1</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1999" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2000"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2001" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;সঞ্চারপথটি অধিবৃত্ত নির্দেশ করে।</p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="width: 13.445em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2026" style="width: 5.535em; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2042" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.99em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2044" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.097em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mfrac><mn>11</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm \frac{x^2}{\frac{25}{4}}-\frac{y^2}{\frac{11}{4}}=1</script></span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

<p>সঞ্চারপথটি অধিবৃত্ত শনাক্তের জন্য করে ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                                        </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\rm \frac{1-ix}{1+ix}=\frac{\left(1-ix\right)^2}{\left(1+ix\right)\left(1-ix\right)}=\frac{1-x^2-2ix}{1+x^2}=\frac{1-x^2}{1+x^2}-\frac{2x}{1+x^2}i</script></span></p>

<p>তাহলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2160" style="width: 3.814em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4.</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>.1</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2191" style="width: 20.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.658em, 1016.64em, 3.035em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2192"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2193" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2194" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2202" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4.</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>.1</mn></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\rm \therefore a^2+b^2=\left(\frac{1-x^2}{1+x^2}\right)^2+\left(\frac{2x}{1+x^2}\right)^2=\frac{\left(1-x^2\right)^2+4.x^2.1}{\left(1+x^2\right)^2}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>e</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2267" style="width: 10.166em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2295" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2296" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2298"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">\rm =\frac{\left(1+x^2\right)^2}{\left(1+x^2\right)^2}=1\ \left(Proved\right)</script></span></p>

<p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2306" style="width: 3.814em; প্রমাণ করার জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2421" style="width: 15.371em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4.1.7</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2.1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>21</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2444" style="width: 12.871em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2445"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2449" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2503"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2504"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2505" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

<p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2507" style="width: 6.723em; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>
